phase1_scenario1_1.title: Restaurant Reservation (Call & SMS Fallback)
phase1_scenario1_1.description: A customer asks their Agent to make a restaurant reservation. If the restaurant owner doesn't answer the call, the system automatically falls back to SMS, allowing the owner to respond with simple numerical inputs.

action.content: 오늘 저녁 7시쯤, 친구들과 식당에서 모임을 하고 싶은데 적당한 장소 좀 찾아줘.

action.reason: The customer wants me to find and book a restaurant. The first step is to contact the restaurant to check for availability. I will try calling them first.
The restaurant owner did not answer my call. I need to try another way to contact them to make the reservation.

action.content: Customer requested a reservation for 8/31 at 7 PM. Is this available? Reply 1 for yes, 2 for no, 3 for alternative time.
action.reason: Since the phone call was not answered, I will send an SMS message as a fallback. This allows the owner to respond asynchronously. I will ask for the reservation and provide simple options for them to reply.

action.content: 3 8pm
7 PM is not available, but 8 PM is. Would you like to change?
action.reason: The restaurant owner has proposed an alternative time of 8 PM. I need to confirm this change with the customer before proceeding with the booking.

action.content: Yes, change to 8 PM.
Reservation confirmed for 8 PM
action.reason: The customer has agreed to the new time. I will now send a message to the restaurant owner to confirm the reservation for 8 PM.

phase1_scenario1_2.title: Care Call (Daily Check-in & Emergency Call)
phase1_scenario1_2.description: An Agent makes daily check-in calls to an elderly person. Based on their response, it can trigger an emergency call to a guardian or hospital.

action.reason: It's time for the scheduled daily check-in call with the elderly person. I will initiate the call now.

action.content: Grandma, how are you feeling today? Press 1 for good, 2 for a little sick, 3 for very sick.
action.reason: The call is connected. I will start the check-in by asking about their well-being and provide simple numeric options for an easy response.
The user responded that they are feeling 'a little sick'. According to my protocol, this requires notifying the guardian. I will call the guardian now.

action.content: Grandma reported feeling a little sick today. Please check on her.
action.reason: I've connected with the guardian. I will inform them that the elderly person reported feeling a little sick so they can check on them.

action.content: Have you taken your blood pressure medication? Press 1 for yes, 2 for no, 3 for out of medicine.
action.reason: I've notified the guardian. Now I will continue the check-in with the elderly person and ask about their medication.
The user has indicated they are out of their blood pressure medication. This is an important issue that requires the guardian's attention. I will call the guardian again to inform them.

action.content: Grandma is out of blood pressure medication. Please assist with medication delivery.
action.reason: I've connected with the guardian again. I will inform them that the elderly person is out of their medication so they can arrange for a refill.
The check-in is complete, and the guardian has been notified of all important issues. I will now end the call with the elderly person.

phase2_scenario2_2.title: Restaurant Reservation (CatchTable Integration)
phase2_scenario2_2.description: The Lite Agent integrates with a third-party reservation platform like CatchTable, allowing customers to book through their Agent while still receiving platform-specific benefits.

action.content: Book a table for 2 tonight at 7 PM at [Restaurant Name] in Gangnam.

action.reason: The customer wants to book a table. I will use the CatchTable API to check for availability at the requested time.

action.content: 7 PM is fully booked, but 8 PM is available for 2 people. Change?
action.reason: The CatchTable API response shows that the requested time is unavailable, but 8 PM is free. I need to inform the customer and ask if they want to book for the alternative time.

action.content: Yes, 8 PM.

action.reason: The customer has agreed to the 8 PM reservation. I will now use the CatchTable API to book the table.

action.content: This restaurant has a CatchTable promotion for a free dessert this week. Confirm?
action.reason: The booking is confirmed. I see there's a promotion available through CatchTable. I should inform the customer about this potential benefit.

action.content: OK.

phase3_scenario3_1.title: Personalized Restaurant Reservation
phase3_scenario3_1.description: Customer Agent and Merchant Agent communicate directly. The Merchant Agent uses past order history and preferences to offer personalized suggestions, while the Customer Agent leverages customer profiles.

action.content: Book a table for 2 tomorrow evening.
action.reason: My customer wants to book a table. I will contact the restaurant's merchant agent directly to make the request.

action.content: Last time, you ordered Carbonara and a bottle of wine. Shall I prepare them again?
action.reason: I've received a reservation request. I have access to this customer's order history. To provide a personalized experience, I will ask if they want to repeat their previous order.

action.content: What new items are on the menu?
action.reason: The merchant agent offered to repeat the last order, but my customer might want something new. I will ask for new menu items on behalf of my customer.

action.content: We just launched a new Truffle Pasta this week.
action.reason: The customer agent is asking for new items. We have a new Truffle Pasta. I will recommend it.

action.content: They have a new Truffle Pasta. Would you like to try it, or repeat your last order?
action.reason: The merchant agent has suggested a new menu item. I need to present this option to my customer and ask for their preference.

action.content: Truffle Pasta sounds good. And the same wine.

use_case_1_restaurant_reservation.title: 식당 예약 (Use Case 1)
use_case_1_restaurant_reservation.description: Agent가 고객을 대신하여 식당 예약 및 와인 재고를 확인하고, API를 통해 와인 추천까지 제공하는 시나리오

action.content: 오늘 저녁 7시쯤에 8명 정도 와인동호회 모임할만한 이탈리안 식당 찾아서 예약해줘. 아마로네 와인 재고 있는지도 확인해줘.
네, 주로 이용하시는 서울 2호선 라인의 와인이 유명한 이탈리안 식당 정보를 확인해볼게요.
action.reason: The customer has requested a reservation. Based on their profile and past preferences, I know they frequent restaurants along Seoul's Line 2. I'll start my search there and inform them of my plan.
I've identified a potential restaurant. I will call them to check for availability for 8 people and inquire about their Amarone wine stock as requested.

action.content: 안녕하세요, SKT 인증 Agent 서비스입니다. 이정윤 고객님을 대신해 오늘 저녁 7시, 8명 단체 예약 예정입니다. 예약 가능여부 및 아마로네 와인 재고 응답해주시면 전달드리겠습니다.
action.reason: The call is connected. I will introduce myself as a certified agent and clearly state the customer's request: a table for 8 at 7 PM and the availability of Amarone wine.

action.content: 와인 재고는 충분히 있는데, 7시는 어렵고 8시/9시 타임 비어있어요.

정윤님, 와인 재고가 있는 식당 중, 예상 선호도 기반으로 예약 가능한 식당 실시간 확인을 마쳤어요. [명동키친]으로 예약해드릴까요? [정보 요약 제공] 명동키친 (식당링크, 평점) - 7시 가능 - 와인 재고 O - 콜키지, 주요 메뉴, 주차 오스테리아 꼬또 (식당링크, 평점) - 7시 불가, 8시/9시 가능 - 와인 재고O - 콜키지, 주요 메뉴, 주차
action.reason: I have gathered information from multiple restaurants. I will now present the customer with the best options, including availability, wine stock, and other relevant details like ratings and policies, so they can make an informed decision.

action.content: 응, 명동키친으로 예약해줘. 아마로네 와인도 3병 미리 확보 해줘
안녕하세요, SKT 인증 Agent 서비스입니다. 이정윤 고객님을 대신해 오늘 저녁 7시, 8명 단체 예약 확정하려고 합니다. 고객님이 미리 아마로네 와인 3병 세팅 요청하셨습니다. 예약 가능할까요? [1. 예약 확정 / 2. 예약 불가 / 3. 직접 통화 연결]
action.reason: The customer has made their choice and requested to secure 3 bottles of wine. I will send a confirmation request to the restaurant via SMS for efficiency, providing clear options for their response.

action.content: 정윤님, 예약이 확정되었습니다. 예약 1시간 전 문자 알림 드릴게요. 구글 캘린더에 일정을 등록해드릴까요?
action.reason: The reservation is confirmed. I will notify the customer and offer to add the event to their calendar for convenience.

action.content: 응. 와인 모임으로 된 공유 캘린더에 등록해주고, 모임 멤버들한테도 1시간 전에 문자 알림 줘

action.reason: The customer is having a wine club meeting. To enhance their experience, I will use an external API to get recommendations for other wines that would pair well with the restaurant's menu.

action.response:
해산물 파스타와 잘 어울려요, 산뜻한 피노 그리지오 (아마존 링크)
고르곤졸라 피자에 추천해요, 단맛이 있는 모스카토 다스티 (아마존 링크)
양고기 로스트와 먹었을 때 평이 좋아요. 높은 산도와 묵직함이 특징인 바롤로 (아마존 링크)
action.reason: The customer is having a wine club meeting. To enhance their experience, I will use an external API to get recommendations for other wines that would pair well with the restaurant's menu.

action.content:
네, 캘린더에 등록해드렸어요. 캘린더에 등록된 연락처로 다른 멤버들에게도 문자 알림 드리겠습니다. 와인 모임을 위해 메뉴와 잘 어울릴만한 와인들도 추가 준비해보시는 건 어떤가요?
==========
해산물 파스타와 잘 어울려요, 산뜻한 피노 그리지오 (아마존 링크)
고르곤졸라 피자에 추천해요, 단맛이 있는 모스카토 다스티 (아마존 링크)
양고기 로스트와 먹었을 때 평이 좋아요. 높은 산도와 묵직함이 특징인 바롤로 (아마존 링크)
action.reason: I have received the wine recommendations. I will forward this information to the customer, along with confirmation that the calendar event has been created and shared as requested.

action.content: 정윤님, 명동키친 방문 1시간 전이에요! 방문 장소까지 최소 시간이 소요되는 대중교통 경로를 제공해드릴까요?
action.reason: The reservation is in one hour. I will send a reminder to the customer as scheduled and offer to provide directions to the restaurant.

use_case_2_senior_life_mate.title: 시니어 라이프 메이트 (Use Case 2)
use_case_2_senior_life_mate.description: 어르신을 위해 건강 맞춤 식당을 추천 및 예약하고, 교통편까지 예약해주는 시나리오

action.content: 오늘 저녁 7시쯤, 친구들과 식당에서 모임을 하고 싶은데 적당한 장소 좀 찾아줘.
네, 어르신. 최근 혈당 수치와 식단 기록을 반영해 당뇨 관리에 좋은 식당을 추천드릴게요. 최근에 다녀오셨던 ‘신촌 닭한마리’ 혹은 ‘병천 유황오리’ 어떠세요?
action.reason: The user wants a restaurant recommendation. Based on their health data (high blood sugar), I will suggest restaurants that are good for diabetic diets and that they have previously enjoyed.

action.content: 닭한마리 좋아. 예약 되는지 확인해줘.

action.reason: The user chose 'Shinchon Dakhanmari'. I will call the restaurant to check if a reservation for 4 people at 7 PM is possible.

action.content: 안녕하세요. SKT 인증 라이프메이트 서비스입니다. 김미경 어르신을 대신해 오늘 저녁 7시 4명 예약 가능한지 확인 부탁 드립니다.
action.reason: The call is connected. I will state my purpose clearly: making a reservation on behalf of my user.

action.content: 오늘은 예약이 다 차서 불가능해요.

action.reason: The first choice was unavailable. I will now try the second option I suggested, 'Byeongcheon Yu황ori', which is also a healthy choice for the user.

action.content: 안녕하세요. SKT 인증 라이프메이트 서비스입니다. 김미경 어르신을 대신해 오늘 저녁 7시 4명 예약 가능한지 확인 부탁 드립니다.
action.reason: The call is connected. I will state my purpose clearly: making a reservation on behalf of my user.

action.content: 오늘 7시 가능해요. 룸으로 예약해드릴까요?
어르신. 닭한마리는 예약이 불가능하고 유황오리는 가능해요. 7시 룸으로 4명 예약 확정할까요? 음성 답변이 어려우신 경우 ‘1: 좋아요, 2: 다시 찾아줘, 3: 그만하기’ 입력해주세요.
action.reason: I have confirmed availability at the second restaurant. I will inform the user about the situation and ask for their confirmation to book it. I'll provide simple numeric options for an easy response.
The user has confirmed the booking. I will call the restaurant again to finalize the reservation.

action.content: 안녕하세요. SKT 인증 라이프메이트 서비스입니다. 김미경 어르신을 대신해 오늘 저녁 7시 4명 병천 유황오리 룸으로 최종 예약 확정 부탁 드립니다.
action.reason: The call is connected. I will confirm the final reservation details with the restaurant staff.

action.content: 네, 예약 확정 되었습니다.
오늘 7시 4명 병천 유황오리로 예약 완료했습니다.
action.reason: The reservation is confirmed. I will send a confirmation message to the user.

action.content: 식당까지 이동을 도와드릴게요. 평소 이용하시던 우버 택시를 6시 30분에 불러드릴까요?
action.reason: To provide further assistance, I will offer to book transportation for the user, suggesting their preferred service, Uber.

action.content: 응, 부탁해.

action.reason: The user has requested a taxi. I will use the Uber API to book a ride for them at the appropriate time.

action.content: 네, 택시 예약 완료했습니다. 택시가 도착 10분 전에 알림 드릴게요. 택시비는 SKT 통신사 빌링을 통해 자동 결제 됩니다.
action.reason: The taxi is booked. I will inform the user, provide details about the booking, and explain how the payment will be handled for their convenience.

action.content: 오늘 저녁 메뉴인 오리고기는 단백질이 풍부하고 포만감을 오래 유지시켜 당뇨 환자의 식단 조절에 도움이 돼요. 특히 야채와 함께 먹으면 혈당 관리에도 도움이 되니 참고해주세요. 식사 후 혈당 체크 잊지 않도록 2시간 뒤 알려드릴게요.
action.reason: To provide further assistance, I will provide dietary advice related to their meal and set a reminder for them to check their blood sugar after eating.
